ceo_message.name: Agnishwar Jayaprakash
ceo_message.title: Founder & CEO, Garuda Aerospace
ceo_message.quote: Garuda Aerospace has set a target of manufacturing two lakh drones in the next two years for our farmers. This will be a huge support to the Indian economy in generating employment for trained pilots. These drones will help farmers in transporting their produce such as fruits, vegetables, and flowers to markets in minimal time, boosting their income. Additionally, they will be used to spray insecticides and nutrients in the fields, further enhancing agricultural productivity and sustainability.
